website_summaries.verdict: Turns the underside of your bed into a safe and out-of-sight storage area.
pros: Compartment for storage is hidden underneath the mattress
Gas lifting mechanism assists in opening storage compartment
Stylish modern tufted linen headboard and footboard
cons: The lift mechanism can be challenging to shut fully
Storage is a little more challenging to access than in other designs

customer_reviews.title: ... about 4 hours to put this together but we love it. Looks and feels very high quality
customer_reviews.text: It took my daughter and I about 4 hours to put this together but we love it. Looks and feels very high quality. We have a 14 inch mattress on it so you don't see much of the headboard once the pillows are on the bed. I was worried that the lift mechanism might not work or not work well but once it was all put together it is perfect. My daughter is extremely happy with her beautiful new bed and I'm thrilled that we have that storage space but I do with it was a few inches deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Grayson

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the bed
customer_reviews.text: Well I have to admit I was afraid to order something so big through Amazon. I just knew it would be damaged and I would have to pack it up to return it. The boxes did look a little rough, but no damage. We put it together, I say we as I helped with a few screws, my husband did most of the work, took about two hours. I am very happy with the bed. Really nice looking, holds everything we needed the storage for and it looks nice. I would recommend it. I truly think this is a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry in Florida

customer_reviews.title: I will say it's a great bed, but it's really hard to pull the ...
customer_reviews.text: I will say it's a great bed, but it's really hard to pull the bed down once you pop it open.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna B

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed and recieved only one of two boxes. I contacted the manufacturer, as the manual said to do for any missing parts. I was told that it's not possible to get a replacement, not even if I purchase it separately, contact Amazon. The Amazon representative I spoke with was wonderful and immediately refunded the purchase, however, I am still stuck with no bed and almost 100lbs of now trash cluttering my dining room - this will not fit in my vehicle -or- trash bin, and nobody wants useless bed frame pieces so I can't even give it away.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent storage/ attractive bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! Took me 2.5 hours to put together by myself. I used a chair to support one side when two people would have been helpful. Directions were easy to follow, all parts clearly labeled. My only suggestion would be to toss the hex wrench it comes with and use one with a handle. This is my third kit purchase and I can say kudos to how well labeled everything was. I am in a tiny retirement home with just two and a half closets. The storage in this bed is great. And the height is perfect for me. Like everyone says, it’s not grey which makes me happy. I like the taupe color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice look, great storage space, easy to lift and good price. I took 1 star off because it was Prime but still took awhile to get here. It is rather large packages and came from Canada, so understandable but you know we Primers are spoilex! :). Anyhoo, it was easy fairly simple to put together, the end part putting the frame on the hydraulics seemed a bit tricky and was helpful to have someone there to assist, but everything else was straight forward. I didn’t add the bottom part to the bed so I could have more storage room and it worked out great. Get this bed! *Just be ready for it to not get there in 2-3 days.
customer_reviews.author: CAS

customer_reviews.title: Overall, quite nice
customer_reviews.text: When you first get this and see all the parts, it is a little intimidating. However, the instructions are easy and the assembly is not as bad as you might originally think. The actual product, once you get it built, is quite good. It seems solid and there are no weird creaking noises and such - nice and quiet. Also, the lift mechanism is fantastic and the gas struts are super strong so they will do all the heavy lifting for you. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zero Calvin

customer_reviews.title: we are very happy with this bed
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about ordering this online having not seen it in person but, we are very happy with this bed! Directions were easy to understand and parts & hardware were clearly labeled. It took 2 of us about 3 hours to completely assemble and we are very happy with the results. The boxes were pretty beat up when they arrived, probably because they were so heavy that every warehouse worker or delivery person pushed or pulled it across the floor. But, the parts, included the padded parts were well protected with cloth and cardboard packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer is a hot mess
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bed when I received it (Even though they sent the wrong one first), but 3 months in the middle started sinking in the middle (there is no support) and I have been trying to get a replacement part ever since. 5 packages later, I still have not received the right or undamaged replacement part no matter how many pictures I send them.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for the price point. The bed was packaged very well to prevent damage during shipping. It was very easy to assemble and I didn't notice any strong chemical odors. It only took me 2 hours to assemble with the help of my 8 and 10 year old kids. I was very impressed at how well this bed was put together and how sturdy it is. The only thing that could have made this bed better is if the headboard was maybe 6in taller so you could see it better after the mattress and pillows are on it. I would love to see this bed in more color options like white, so I could get them for my girls.
customer_reviews.author: princesskay612

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bed.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed with storage under the bed. I bought for a spare bed, and not using a box spring. Good hydrolic lift. I had a little difficulty putting it together, halfway thru the instructions ( yes I read them) were incorrect. I called customer service and the emailed corrected ones immediately. I suggest the distributor and or manufactor send corrected ones. If you buy, it’s great bed that’s lower to the floor, just call first for new instructions to save frustrations. Nothing wrong with bed, just instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: Good!!
customer_reviews.text: This came in 2 boxes. It was too heavy for me to bring in myself so I took the pieces in a few at a time. I did use a 12v driver to assemble. I would recommend doing it this way so long as you don’t go crazy with tightening. Using a driver will reduce assembly time by 1/3 I estimate. Be careful that the sides are oriented the correct way!!! I put them on backward and had to disassemble half of it. I was impressed by the fit, though. Very nicely done
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces, took nearly a month to be delivered. Bed itself is great
customer_reviews.text: There were significant missing pieces when the bed was delivered, and it took nearly a month before the replacement pieces were delivered. This was extremely frustrating and meant I had to reschedule the corresponding assembly appointment Amazon Home Services were great at helping resolve this, and the bed itself is great - the one star is because of the missing pieces and the amount of time taken for them to finally be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good value for this type of bed!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this bed. I live in an historic home (read: no closets) and needed extra storage space for bulky bedding and seasonal items; this bed has been a godsend in that regard. It's structurally sturdier than I'd thought it would be, too! The pleather/vinyl upholstery is on the thin side, unfortunately, and my pets have scuffed up the sides quite a bit; for the budget price, though, I'm more than pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A. Culp

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bed, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for our 12 year old. Pretty easy to put together, took me about 1 hour. Lots of storage underneath. Some buyers mention the metal bed frame isn't very strong. I would say if you are under 225 you should be fine. I wouldn't recommend anyone of any weight to jump up and down on a mattress on this bed. It would probably fail after a while.
customer_reviews.author: matt70

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't operate
customer_reviews.text: Hydraulic lifts key to this purchase do not operate. Arrived inoperable. Could have found less expensive manual lift-up bed if that's what we'd wanted. Also arrive slightly damaged due to poor packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Justlookingforvalue

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, very sturdy, good looking bed. Took us, my boyfriend and I, about 2 hours to put it together. Very good instructions are included. Bed was very well packaged and I received it without damage. I had a little trouble getting the bed due to COVID 19,(shipping took longer than estimated) but I would have liked if the seller had offered better shipping updates. I purchased an Avocado Queen pillowtop mattress which is supposed to weigh 97-132 lbs..... it is a heavy mattress and the lift has no problem lifting it up and it holds it up so you can get under the mattress to place your things. I would recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy Again
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy bed, which I love and handles heavy mattresses like its nothing. However the tool they give you for the screws needs to be 1/2 an inch longer to make instalation go faster. Seriously it doesn't fit in all the areas comfortably and this bed HAS A TON OF HARDWARE. I had some quality issues such a bent bracket and a small tear. However, it all worked out with a a sharpie and hammer. Not a big deal for me, at least not enough to call customer support. If you buy this bed I am sure you will be happy with it after its put together. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Bookzilla

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great! Please note that is comes in 2 boxes so make sure you get 2 boxes when the carrier drops off. I consider my husband and myself ikea furniture masters and this bed gave us a run for our money. You really do need two people to put it together and an electric screwdriver. Storage underneath is HUGE!!
customer_reviews.author: molly's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous this wouldn’t be good quality since the price was so low but was pleasantly surprised at the quality! My girls love putting their stuff in storage totes and hiding them away. It‘s hard for small kids to push it down but they put all their body weight and have fun pushing them down. They are 12 & 10 but very tiny for their ages. This would be great if you had stuff you want to hide from little kids. There was one missing step in instructions. I think around step 20. Had to figure it out. Otherwise good instructions and not that difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Casey C.

customer_reviews.title: JUST PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: ONLY GOOD THINGS TO SAY ABOUT THIS BED. ITS BEAUTIFUL, EXACTLY LIKE THE PICTURE. AND FOR A BED WITH SO MANY PARTS IT WAS HONESTLY THE EASIEST PIECE OF FURNITURE I'VE EVER BUILT. YES IT TOOK A WHILE, I DID IT ON MY OWN, WITH THE LABELING OF EACH AND EVERY PIECE, AND THE CRYSTAL CLEAR INSTRUCTIONS MADE THE CONSTRUCTION PAINLESS. ONCE BUILT IT WORKS GREAT, RAISES AND LOWERS WITH EASE, I KEEP ALL MY BLANKETS, SHOES, AND EVEN MY VACUUM AND BROOM IN THERE. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Squilly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order, and the box was very damaged. It came in open or it open because the tape looks very old. I'm currently painting my home so I won't be opening anytime soon. I really hope and pray it's not damaged, I was really looking forward for this. UPDATE: Omg! I am extremely happy with it. It's not damaged at all, now my little room has the right space it needed, and I'm about to store my covers under and put away some clothes when the season changes. I'm super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Yesi

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for the price!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a king, had it for a couple weeks now and are extremely Happy with it. Works great! Awesome if you need storage room. Also realized that you would never know it' has storage space in it until you lift it so if your trying to put away private things ;) its perfect. Takes About a few hours to assemble but I'm not a very handy either so. Definitely recommend 2 people to build. Comes with the tools you need to assemble it with. Certainly recomend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: mode some modifications
customer_reviews.text: made this for storage now with modifications I have about 15" under bed for storage. Cost about another $80.00 for the lumber but now I con store stuff out of the way , 8" just wasn't going to get it. not to hard to build . about 4 Hr for assembly, then about 3 Hr for modification, just love it thanks
customer_reviews.author: reloc

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, Ample Storage, Tedious to assemble
customer_reviews.text: In short the finished product looks nice, is well constructed, and offers ample storage. The assembly itself is quite tedious and I dread having to ever move it. All in it took me 3 hrs and I'm very-much mechanically inclined. There is at least one stem (attaching the top frame to the hydraulics) that absolutely requires a 2nd pair of hands. Assembly aside this thing does what I need it to do and for that it gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: SDinNC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to a guest room or small home with little storage.
customer_reviews.text: Loved that the instructions were clear, all of the parts were clearly marked. It does take some time and someone Will need assistance with assembly once you are ready to attach the mattress portion but otherwise that assembly was pleasant and not frustrating as some "some assemble required" purchases can be. The appholstery is beautiful and finnish was suprisingly better than I expected. It is a sturdy frame once put together. I was a little surprised the headboard was shorter than I expected but no worries there.
customer_reviews.author: Bull38843

customer_reviews.title: Really cool bed
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this by myself in under three hours. Very well made. Directions are very clear and well written. You should not need to drill anything or anything like that. Just be mindful of the directions LOL. Anyway, thought it might be helpful to hear another perspective since so many were complaining about assembly... I assemble furniture fairly often, and I found this to be one of the easier pieces I have ever assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Rashel

customer_reviews.title: New updates/improvements - looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned about this after reading some of the negative reviews - but I received all parts and it looks great! 1. Great packaging of all the screws and bolts shrinked wrapped on to one sheet. 2. All parts are clearly labeled and assembly is straight forward 3. Took me 3 hours, not the 1.5 hours assembly time listed 4. Huge storage space, easily fit several full duffke bags 5. I don’t understand the issue with people complaining about the bent middle support rod, me (130lbs) + boyfriend (185lbs) - no issues 6. Airlifts were a little stiff first few times but works smoothly now. Sounds like previous reviews issues a little exaggerated?
customer_reviews.author: bizukia

customer_reviews.title: BEST STORAGE BED AROUND
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bed that was good price, well designed and that provided maximum storage. I was so excited when I completed building this bed. The amount of space one loses in the spine spine of the bed with other beds (drawers, etc) is nuts. This bed gives you that and so much more. I literally emptied out 2 108 qt. containers full of bags and movies and I still have over 2/3 of the bed with open space.
customer_reviews.author: Oilicec G. Robbio

customer_reviews.title: Still love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this bed for a couple of years now and still love it. We have a queen and it is in our guest room and has tons of storage underneath. We mostly stick all of our linnen and comforters in the bed so irlt doesn't take up any closet space. It's pretty durable... I can not count the number of times I've had to stop 3 little monkeys from jumping on the bed. I highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Wyrmie

customer_reviews.title: Hardware problems.
customer_reviews.text: Great design and great quality. Only reason I don’t give it a 5 start is because of poor choice of the Bolts. I prefer regular hex head bolts so a traditional ratchet and socket could be used. The Allen bolts kept stripping the heads so I had to tighten carefully. I easily stripped about 10 for not being careful. It took forever to assemble but once all set up, my girlfriend and I tested it overnight as hard as we could and handled all the Aggressive forces. Then the morning after, we tested it again and had no problems or squeak noises. Great design. I stored my clothes, books, and shoes under. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sarvidec

customer_reviews.title: Best Assembly Instructions Ever
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were so simple. The screws were sealed and numbered on one cardboard. There were even extra parts and screws provided. The product is sturdy and well made. The storage is exactly as it is pictured. Highly recommend it. I am a 74 year old woman who put it together with minimum assistance from my son. The only complaint I have is that it is not made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed and great for storage.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bed and looks a lot more expensive then it is. Comes in 2 boxes. I hired a couple of experienced guys to assemble it for $75 took them less then hour and half. I know it would be very hard to assemble if you’re not handy and definetly need 2 people. A lot of parts and pieces. The queen size has tons storage. I like that the sides and headboard are not bulky so it doesn’t take up as much room. The platform sits a bit higher off floor so you don’t need a very thick mattress. The one I bought is just a bit too high. But it will depend on your preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took a while (about 3 hours between two people), but I'm loving it. Feels sturdy, doesn't creek, material is nice, lift function works great, and the storage is a game changer. Huge improvement over my previous frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Large storage capacity.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend doing the work between two people. It took us about two hours to assemble all the pieces, the instructions are clear and easy to follow. The bed is not the most sturdy, I do not recommend that children play and jump on it. But the best thing about this platform bed is the large storage capacity, ideal for small apartments.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy King size frame, but takes time to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: We assembled it over a couple days to give ourselves some time. We made a mistake in the beginning by putting the sides in wrong position. So reversing that cost us time halfway through. Putting in the lift bracket was tricky, needing an extra pair of hands. Having a socket wrench with an Allen bit did help overall & to tighten fittings. The two boxes delivered were well packed and all the parts clearly labeled. The frame is well built and sturdy. The storage capacity seems good. It is easy to lift with the hydraulics. A little hard to push it back down. We plan to put some lightweight bulky items in the storage and free up closet space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs. Plus looks really good
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed. It was perfect for my 17 yr old daughter. She needed more space so with this bed i was able to get rid of her dresser. Plus she loves the upgrade from a twin size to full size. The bed seems very sturdy. The assembly was easy, the instructions missed one step but you will figure it out. You do need 2 people to assembly toward the end. But so far so good. Will update in about a year unless something goes wrong by then. Thanks for the product.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: the included hex tool is way too short. 4 hours 1 person. Aching back. bloody knuckles.Knee pads & back brace instructions Forget to tell you to tighten the 1st corner attachments. Legs too short for rhumba to vacuum under so I removed them. The bolt strip so there's no removing them after tightening
customer_reviews.author: sdfasd98

customer_reviews.title: NSD is terrible shipping company. Bed seems okay so far..
customer_reviews.text: Really wish I could leave a rating for NSD shipping, the bed so far is good quality but the shipping company is terrible. They only delivered one of the two boxes and they left the 170 lb box up against my neighbors door. They're very old and we're literally trapped in their house. Not very bright truck drivers and I have half of my bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Easy assembly & great for my 10-year old!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter and I put this together in about 3 hours. The directions were great, and the packaging was very intuitive and easy to understand. I had my doubts about how the lifting function would work for her, but it is super smooth going up. She loves having to put a little oomph into pulling it back down. I also love that the bedding doesn’t mess up when you lift the bed. Even though we were tired after we assembled it (started late in the evening), she couldn’t wait to organize her storage space. One of the floorboards had a slight tear in the “leather,” but you can’t see it when the bed is made. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, would be a lot easier to assemble with 2 people.
customer_reviews.text: This has great storage which I needed because I live in a very small home. Was a challenge to put the platform on the hinges by myself, had to rig something up to hold in place while I screwed it together. Worth it even though it took hours to put together by myself without help.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Cole

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy to assemble, but support beans not stiff enough.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Easy to assemble - Easy to take apart - Affordable Cons: - Wooden support beams on frame are not stiff enough to support weight of a 175lb (80kg), 6' tall individual. This creates a non-uniform pressure on the mattress from one side to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: NOT STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed but NOT sturdy!! Great design but not built well. Cross metal bar bent then split. Must be designed for 1 young person. Doesn’t hold weight well.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Flener

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to save space but awful to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Following instructions for assembly exactly and it still took nearly 4 hours to assemble. Some suggestions to make it easier would be to put the foot holder brackets on then screw the feet onto them afterwards and the slats don’t hold until the resting brackets are put in so when it tells you to lift open the bed again afterwards, most of the slats fall out so the resting bars and baseboards should be assembled before placing the slats. Its AWESOME once it’s assembled but it some assembly steps make it harder than it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: Gelene Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Efficient use of small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is awesome for space saving! I’m in a pretty small apt in NYC and this stores my winter clothes perfectly! As well as other stuff as well (my room is about 150 sqft and I have most of my belongings in my room). I would not recommend building this bed without 2 sets of hands and pay close attention to the pictures in the instructions. I had to rebuild some pieces because I was rushing. NOTE: This was packaged in 2 boxes which were delivered a week apart so if you are in dire need of the full bed frame keep this in mind. Not at fault of the seller, just a challenge with the mail carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed. The storage underneath is a life-saver. You can only put short items in the storage, but we are able to fit a lot in it. The bed lifts and lowers very nicely, though you need a bit of strength to start lifting it. I am very happy that our bedding and pillows do not fly everywhere when we lift it up to access the storage-they stay put because the bed moves smoothly when lifting and lowering it. Assembly will take you a while, but the unit is solid and good quality. It looks and works great - I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Adam J Keim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! After multiple uses the hinges are holding strong and the bed still is able to open and close without fault. The headboard is beautiful and overall the bed was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: DSthompson

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a very functional bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is an excellent value. I'm pretty handy so I would say it was fairly easy to put together but took around 2hours total assembly (i think unpacking every individual piece took up a lot of time too). The hydraulic function works perfectly and the bed feels solid. Storage space is great and we fit a ton of stuff underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I put it together by myself in maybe a little over 4 hours. It's great to have all this extra storage space. My only issue is that I scheduled the delivery for a Friday and it showed up that Wednesday so I am glad I was home when they brought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie._.Messie

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame with lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Like: lots of storage under the bed quick deliverr Dislike: The black headboard is ugly. It requires at least two people for assembly. Since it doesn't have a box spring, the sheets won't stay tucked in. I Didn't see assembly option when ordering this frame. I would have chosen it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: This bed is fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Took several hours to assemble but nothing complicated. Very solid and slats accommodated a full size 10" thick foam mattress. The lift works smoothly, opening and closing is easy. Storage space is huge!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Grat design
customer_reviews.text: Excellent storage, and good design. Be prepared to take a long time for assembly, but they provide VERY detailed instructions and very well labelled screws and tools. It just takes some time. But is worth it - great bed and wonderful storage area.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great storage space
customer_reviews.text: This bed is the best. Wonderful for storage. You could literally hide a person in there. Four stars because the backboard could be a little taller. It gets lost once you put comforter and pillows.
customer_reviews.author: PATUTI

customer_reviews.title: Not a grey color !
customer_reviews.text: If u are planing of doing white and grey bedroom this not the one !! Color is defiantly more brownish !! Some people wrote it in reviews and I didn’t listen:( now after 2 hours of assembling of each bed (I purchased 2) I am stock ! Cause it’s to hard now to disassemble and put it in box for return.. 2 days pass I still can’t use to the color !! Ugly. :( Amazon: u need to change the description this not a grey bed !!!!!!!!!!! So disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Cool bed
customer_reviews.text: We really are happy with this bed. It has been a little bit of time, but it is very cool. I hope that it lasts us a long time. Very good building dierections.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: It’s sturdy and easy to use, but will take time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It’s a LONG process to build but worth it. In fact I plan on getting another for my other son since he has just a basic headboard and frame. I found great containers better quality then I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice once you finally set it up.
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to set up. But it’s an awesome addition to my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: EvilScooby

customer_reviews.title: So far - GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad to put together, bed is VERY nice, sharp looking. Tons of storage, although you have to watch weight because bottom wood next to floor is not that heavy. Time will tell if it holds up, just like anything..... Great buy, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Grey. Less storage than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble about 90% of it by myself. I am just a little disappointed that the storage area isn’t deeper. It is raised off the floor so you lose an inch or two. It’s about a shoe box in height of storage. Color was grey so I’m not sure what other reviews are talking about.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: ITS BROKE ALREADY
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bed for about 6 months and it has broke already the metal support has Bent! I’m furious it’s not cheap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition to our guest room
customer_reviews.text: This was not difficult to put together. Yes, it does take a bit of time and we found the assembly pointers in other reviews to be helpful. It is easy to lift and close, too. It is sturdy and well-made and we are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: curlygirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice construction, beautiful bed
customer_reviews.text: My husband and daughter put this together for her room and he was really impressed by the materials and design of the bed. She's very happy with it. She already had many gray decorations in the room, and the bed (gray linen) goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed for Price
customer_reviews.text: Considering all the parts, this was relatively easy to put together. It is also nicely made with pretty gray linen. We had 2 people working on it for the first hour & a 3rd joined in for the last hour which helped make assembly quicker. We also called the 800# to ask about pushing the frame down at the end as it was pretty stiff. She told us to push hard & it has loosened up for easy closer now. The underside fits so much - this is especially perfect for smaller apartments with limited storage. I may buy one for our guest room!
customer_reviews.author: Omaha Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Best piece of furniture I’ve bought !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage daughter and it’s perfect. Built it in less than an hour and it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, be prepared to spend time putting it together.
customer_reviews.text: Although the bed was “easy” to put together there are so many pieces it takes some invested time to put it together, even with two people working on it. I had read this in other reviews prior to purchase so I was aware of what we were getting into. That being said, my teenage son loves his new bed. No regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy G

customer_reviews.title: Very good and works!
customer_reviews.text: Looks ok in the room and actually works. Wasn’t too easy to put together and at first we thought the mechanism is not working - but as soon as we built the whole thing the mechanism worked too! Just don’t put too thick of a mattress, headboard Is low. 11-12 inch works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Storage Bedframe
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed frame. It’s easy to lift up to access the storage under the bed and it looks great. Lots of room for storage. It’s faster to assemble with a power drill but the instructions are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: robin maierhofer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived after long time with damage
customer_reviews.text: Waited so long and It’s arrived damage after that. Very disappointed so Will never prefer again.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh Rawool

customer_reviews.title: Very cool design of bed with storage
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old son put together by himself. Lots of work but he did it just fine. The boxes that come are very heavy. Very cool bed that gives you a lot of storage. Lifts very easy even with big mattress on top.
customer_reviews.author: P. Buzzini

customer_reviews.title: love this bed
customer_reviews.text: So I was very excited when i ordered it and it got here EARLY yes early. assembly was easy enough it looks small as you're building it but trust its the right size. storage is huge and it has great quality leather(nothing special but for the price its great) I finished it by myself while watching tv and even made one or two mistakes along the way and still finished in likd 2 hours give or take
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Well marked parts!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bed. Well organized parts - all were labeled perfectly, and the screws and bolts were bubble packed and labeled very well. Took two of us about 2.5 hours to put it together. Clear instructions. Pretty heavy boxes - if you need to carry them very far, I recommend taking the pieces apart and carrying just a few at a time. Lots of metal! Sturdy, well built, holes all lined up. Pretty decent amount of storage. We used compression bags to squish things down for storage. The gray upholstery looks great with our gray carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Steenhoek

customer_reviews.title: bed comes in 2 packages. they eventually mailed me the remaining part of the bed
customer_reviews.text: It took around 4 hours and 2 people to assemble the bed - it required being very organized and following each step - I thought that there where some steps that could have between made in different order but that’s just me. all in all the bed is super amazing - extremely well made - my 9 year old son loves it - I am buying the queen size next for myself
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Great full size, with good looks!!
customer_reviews.text: This full size bed with under storage is exactly the type of bed we were looking for. It takes a little longer to assemble but easily understood instructions are enclosed. This bed looks great in black leather (faux) and certainly looks more expensive than it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: blew

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I’m not going to say it didn’t take a couple hours to hours & a lot of organizing to assemble-it did. However the end result was a well made & sturdy piece of furniture that would have easily cost more than double without my efforts. Also my wife only had to assist once - the rest I was able to do alone
customer_reviews.author: Curt Fox

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I paid a TaskRabbit about $120 to assemble this -- very glad I did. For the price, it's actually pretty great - easy to lift, solved my storage problem, and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Solid frame no wobbles
customer_reviews.text: easy instructions to build, I was able to do it by myself but I recommend you will finish faster with 2 people. your back will thank you later. overall it is a solid build doesn't wobble as the Ikea frames do.
customer_reviews.author: Luis D. Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Hope you have a lot of flexibility in your availability to receive the order.
customer_reviews.text: I had a horrendous experience trying to get the order delivered. Many deliver dates changed, order not delivered. Continued follow up, one of two cartons lost, needed to reorder. All of this was due to the size of the headboard box. The furniture itself seems to be good quality for the price. Operates as designed. It will take a few hours for two people to assemble. Experience = 1 Star. Product = 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore P. Belvedere

customer_reviews.title: Spacious storage underneath
customer_reviews.text: Was very sceptical buying bed on Amazon but I’m glad I did! Fell in love with it! Perfect full size bed, very spacious storage underneath. Took me 2 1/2 hours to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: GRETA HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great storage and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I docked a star for assembly because it took a long time to assemble it, but otherwise it's great. I can store a snowboard bag with all my gear, a small luggage, clothing, folded chairs and so forth. The hydraulics make it easy to lift up and I have a heavier than normal Queen mattress. Study and stays in place nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer1001

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage  and sturdy at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the extra storage and I needed a platform frame for my mattress. This filled both my needs. Had some shipping issues and I contacted company and they resolved the issues. They have a great customer service team.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Delivery Story
customer_reviews.text: Dropped on the porch which broke the headboard and ripped up the covering on the back I reached out to the company and they helped a great deal If your missing parts or need replacement along with help setting it up The will help you
customer_reviews.author: MIMI

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed, and assembly isn’t so bad.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about purchasing this bed because of all the assembly comments. I’m a not-so-strong 30 year old women that lives by herself. I assembled this bed within a hour and half with a glass of wine, and a few of my own tools. Honestly the most frustrating part was dealing with all the left over packaging. Overall this is a very sturdy and nice looking bed, especially for the price. Just read the instructions and you’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: brenda conway

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Took myself and a couple people roughly an hour and a half to assemble. Fairly straight forward instructions. One of the floor pieces did come torn up on one side, but it wasnt a big deal because the other side was fine so I could just flip it over and have the torn part to the floor. The hydraulics for the lifting part are great and the sound is oddly satisfying when you do it. All around, great bedframe.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed it sturdy and the perfect height I’m 404 pounds and this bed holds up not even a creek with any movement
customer_reviews.author: Tanner d.

customer_reviews.title: everything was good except the gas hydrolics to help lift & close ...
customer_reviews.text: everything was good except the gas hydrolics to help lift & close the bed WOULD NOT budge at all for me. im not a weak dude & they were on the right way but i pushed to the point i was afraid of breaking or bending the frame, luckly you dont nessicarly need the hydrolics but also the screws that hold the back braquets to keep the bed from sliding down when you lift up were also to big & now i cant lift the frame up all the way or else my bed slides down..other the that it is nice looking & a good bed set. but 3 stars for the 2 semi big inconvinces
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Best bed I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! I was expecting it to be cheap, but it was perfect. I love the storage, I really needed it. I store extra blankets and clothes under these. Warning, It is very hard to put together and help is needed in some areas of the puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Ample storage
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble great for storing blankets extra pillows and Christmas items, you will need help lifting the package it’s extremely heavy
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I put this together myself (i'm 64)
customer_reviews.text: This bed is exactly what I wanted it did give me some challenges putting it together but when I finally finished it works perfectly and i'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: nanadi

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is not that hard
customer_reviews.text: Assembly of this is not that difficult. it did take a few hours, but the assembly instructions were very clear and easy to follow. Love this bed! perfect for the spare room with storage for excess bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally some good ideas from Europe in USA and made in USA!!!❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about that bed a specially when you can put a tons of items under ( summer clothing) during the winter. Extra pillows and whatever you want basically you have extra closet!
customer_reviews.author: shoelover

customer_reviews.title: very little storage and difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast; however the bed frame has little storage and is difficult to put together - it took me several hours to get it all put together. It’s a cute bed frame if you are looking a nice upholstered headboard and frame; however I would not recommend it if you are looking for a bed frame with lots of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mossylittlefox

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bed!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room under the mattress to store stuff. I haven’t slept on it yet but putting it together wasn’t too bad and the design seems great. I’ll update if anything changes but as of right now, I’m happy! Edit: I’ve been sleeping on it for a few weeks and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this bed and I was amazed with how easy it was to put together. The instructions were written with diagrams and they numbered the screws so you new which ones to use at all times. The bed frame is durable and all around very well made. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Bed would not open and close
customer_reviews.text: I bought this upholstered bed it was very difficult to assemble and one of the main parts was defective I was like pulling teeth to get a replacement part. And the color didn’t look the same as the picture Would never buy another
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This bed exactly what I was looking for. But it took an hour and a half to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: NIK

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, pay close attention to directions, definitely need 2 people to put together parts of it.
customer_reviews.author: Adriene B

customer_reviews.title: It's very well built and easy to put together (I'll be it with a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very well built and easy to put together (I'll be it with a lot of piece). It is absolutely gray in color. I bought it thinking it was going to be more taupe because of the other reviews and it is definitely gray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent condition -
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were the best... Was so easy to assemble and it looks amazing.. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Quality bed; great storage solution.
customer_reviews.text: Bed looks great. While it took time to correctly assemble,the instructions are thorough and easy to follow. I currently have a heavier mattress on the bed; the lift assist mechanism works great. This bed really improves the functionality of small bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Bucchi

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased that bed for our teenage son in grey color and we absolutely love it! He assembled it mostly by himself with a little help. The storage space is huge! We are considering to buy a similar one in queen size for ourselves, but would like to see more color options. The delivery was fast and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Alenak

product_meta.title: DHP Cambridge Upholstered Linen Platform Bed with Wooden Slat Support and Under Bed Storage, Button Tufted Headboard, Queen Size - Grey
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Color:Gray LinenWant more storage, more space and more style all in one? our Cambridge bed with gas lift storage does all the heavy lifting for you! enjoy tons of extra storage with a powerful hydraulic mechanism that raises up your mattress giving you easy access to storage underneath. Plus, the headboard and footboard feature a stylish tuft design in both faux black leather or grey linen.
feature_bullets: Additional storage space | Practical bedding option with a storage compartment underneath. Perfect space-saving functionality.
Minimal effort | No need for heavy lifting, due to gas lift mechanism making it effortless to lift.
Modern design | Sophisticated headboard and footboard featuring a stylish tuft design.
Colors | Available in both Grey Linen and Black.
Dimensions | 85 inches L x 63 inches W x 42.5 inches H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars414 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
